title: Measurement of phenoloxidase activity
procedures:
PO activity was measured as described<sup>1</sup>, with modifications.  
1.  Incubate purified hemocyanin with proteases in 50 mM Tris-HCl, pH 8.3, containing 0.05 M NaCl, at 20 ˚C for 10 min. 
  2.   Add PAMPs \(pathogen-associated molecular patterns eg: LPS or LTA) dissolved in the same buffer.
  3.   Then add 1 mM 4ME in 0.1 M potassium phosphate, pH 6.0.  
  4.  Immediately after the addition of the substrate, continuously monitor the absorbance at 405 nm using a microplate reader \(Molecular Devices, USA). 
  5.  The PO activity is presented as A405 at 5 min after the addition of substrate.
